adjectives.description: gorgonlike (comparative more gorgonlike, superlative most gorgonlike)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of a gorgon.
examples: When Wilde originally wrote Earnest he never intended Lady Bracknell to be quite so gorgonlike. She became the stereotyped domineering and antagonistic mother-in-law in George Alexander's "reworked" version.
